FROM (SELECT log.log_id, log.log_operuser, CASE WHEN u.user_realname IS NULL THEN log.log_operuser ELSE u.user_realname END AS log_operuserrealname, log.oper_module, lc.log_type, lc.log_oper, lc.log_operdesc, log.log_visitorial, log.log_opertime, log.log_content, log.oper_type, log.log_status, log.remark1, log.remark2, log.remark3, log.remark4, log.remark5 FROM ${tableName} log LEFT JOIN td_sm_user u ON log.log_operuser = u.user_name LEFT JOIN td_sm_logconfig lc ON log.oper_module = lc.oper_module ) ORDER BY log_opertime DESC
